title: Q1 Revision KoL MC
prompt: Which revision of the sentence <u>best</u> expresses the idea concisely and precisely?
description:
Read this sentence.

In conclusion, I will end by stating that the best and most effective ways to reduce and diminish the pollution that makes our city dirty is minimizing our waste, recycling, and making environmentally conscious decisions.
feedback: The correct answer is “The most effective ways to reduce pollution in our city are to minimize our waste, recycle, and make environmentally conscious decisions.” This selection removes all repetition while maintaining parallel structure.
